info.title: Blackjack Web & Odata API Controllers
info.description: API documentation for the Blackjack project

get.summary: Take last one accepted share for each subscription
Returns accident PdfReport data as Unicode content

post.summary: Allows the currently logged-in user to change their password. The user must provide their old password for verification before setting a new password.
Update specific user's password with new password. Can be run only by admin!

get.summary: Log user action on logout

post.summary: Log user action on logout
Updates a user's name by replacing the old username with a new one. This method ensures that the username is unique and valid before making the change.

Registers an insured person by associating their account with a specified customer number / policy number / device number depending on the tenant configuration. This method ensures the insured individual is linked to the correct policy for authentication and identification purposes.
Register insured person with shared code
Registers the with device.
Registers the with Email.

get.summary: Send email.
Get current user's contact person information
Retrieves agreement of the specific type for the currently logged-in user and his subscription.

post.summary:
Adds new agreement of the specific type for the currently logged-in user and his subscription.
If such agreement exist, error will be returned.

Ensures that a user with given username and password exists in Amaline and in portal.
Creates a new user in portal if the user doesn't exist yet, or updates existing user details.
Creates the renault subscription.
Verifies the renault user.

get.summary:
Retrieves tenant settings from D-Insight. 
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

Retrieves expressions for a specified period from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person. 

- If executed by an Admin: 
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Provide a user ID for driver-related data. 
- If executed by an Insured Person:
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Do not provide any additional pramaters for driver-related data.

Retrieves trip expressions for a specified period from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

- If executed by an Admin: 
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Provide a user ID for driver-related data. 
- If executed by an Insured Person:
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Do not provide any additional pramaters for driver-related data.

Retrieves variables for a specified period from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

- If executed by an Admin: 
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Provide a user ID for driver-related data. 
- If executed by an Insured Person:
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Do not provide any additional pramaters for driver-related data.

Retrieves trip variables for a specified subscription from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

Retrieves multiple trips details for specific period for subscription from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

Retrieves vehicle score or driver score for a specified period from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

- If executed by an Admin: 
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Provide a user ID for driver-related data. 
- If executed by an Insured Person:
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Do not provide any additional pramaters for driver-related data.

Retrieves vehicle or driver driving feedback for a specified period from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

- If executed by an Admin: 
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Provide a user ID for driver-related data. 
- If executed by an Insured Person:
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Do not provide any additional pramaters for driver-related data.

Retrieves vehicle score rank from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

Retrieves vehicle scores list and driving summary over period split by interval (daily, weekly, monthly) from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Define intervals that given date range can be split: 0 - Daily, 1 - Weekly, 2 - Monthly

get.summary:
Check if specific driver is available in D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

Retrieves profile statistics (avarage score, participants count, etc) for D-Insight tenant.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

Retrieves vehicle or driver variables over period split by interval (daily, weekly, monthly) from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

- If executed by an Admin: 
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Provide a user ID for driver-related data. 
- If executed by an Insured Person:
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Do not provide any additional pramaters for driver-related data.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Intervals that given date range can be split: 0 - Daily, 1 - Weekly, 2 - Monthly

get.summary:
Retrieves vehicle or driver expressions over period split by interval (daily, weekly, monthly) from D-Insight.
This method can be executed by an Admin or an Insured Person.

- If executed by an Admin: 
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Provide a user ID for driver-related data. 
- If executed by an Insured Person:
  - Include a subscription ID in the URL for vehicle-related data, or  
  - Do not provide any additional pramaters for driver-related data.

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description: Intervals that given date range can be split: 0 - Daily, 1 - Weekly, 2 - Monthly

post.summary: Changes the user's password using a provided reset token.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The data model containing the reset token and new password.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: The data model containing the reset code and new password.

get.summary: Get personal activity by name.
The get personal activities.

post.summary: Patches activity name.

Creates a new policy, adds or updates vehicle and customer details, assigns a unit, 
or creates one if necessary, based on the specified model data and tenant configuration.
This method can be executed only by an Admin.

parameters.name: receivedPolicy
parameters.description: An object containing the policy creation data (PolicyCreationData).

post.summary:
Terminates an existing policy and creates a new one for the same customer, vehicle, and unit.  
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: policyNumber
parameters.description: The policy number of the existing policy to be terminated.

parameters.name: renewData
parameters.description: An object containing the data required for creating the new policy (PolicyRenewData).

post.summary:
Terminates an existing policy and creates a new one for the same customer and unit,  
but replaces the existing vehicle with a new one.  
This process is typically used when a customer purchases a new vehicle and requires a new policy for it.  
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: policyNumber
parameters.description: The policy number of the existing policy to be terminated.

parameters.name: transferData
parameters.description: An object containing the data required for the vehicle transfer and policy creation (PolicyTransferData).

post.summary:
Terminates an existing policy.
This method can be executed by an Admin or Insured Person.

parameters.name: policyNumber
parameters.description: The policy number of the existing policy to be terminated.

parameters.name: terminationData
parameters.description: Optional data with delivery address if device should be returned to it.

post.summary:
Updates the expiration date of an active policy, provided it has not already been terminated.  
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The policy number for which the expiration date needs to be updated.

parameters.name: dateModel
parameters.description: An object containing the new expiration date (DateModel).

post.summary:
Updates the start date of an active policy, provided it has not already been "started".  
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The policy number for which the start date needs to be updated.

parameters.name: dateModel
parameters.description: An object containing the new start date (DateModel).

post.summary:
Update the ExpirationDate of the current subscription.
This method can be executed by an Admin.

Updates the current policy number to a new one after validating its uniqueness.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: An object containing the current policy number, the new policy number, and flag if we want the change to be made in CCP or in Mlog as well (PolicyNumberChangeModel).

post.summary:
Updates the current customer number to a new one after validating its uniqueness.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: An object containing the current customer number, the new customer number, and flag if we want the change to be made in CCP or in Mlog as well (CustomerNumberChangeModel).

post.summary:
Updates the `RequestedTripRecordingMode` field for the specified policy.  
This method is primarily used in the Scope Technology mobile application to distinguish between different types of trip recording features.  
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: An object containing the policy identifier or number and the desired recording mode (SetRecordingModeModel).

post.summary:
Method is called when unit replacement is needed for the policy/vehicle. 
New device type can be specified/requested for dispatching in the Mlog.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

Updates an existing installation job in Mlog that is linked to an active policy.
A new device type, delivery method, and address can be specified in the Mlog.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: policyNumber
parameters.description: The policy number for which the change should be made.

post.summary:
Obsolete - reverts termination of the policy.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

parameters.name: policyNumber
parameters.description: The policy number for which the rollback should be made.

get.summary:
Retrieves custom fields of the specific policy.
This method can be executed by an Admin or Insured Person.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The policy number for which custom fields are retrieved

put.summary:
Creates or updates custom field for the specific policy.
This method can be executed by an Admin or Insured Person.

parameters.name: policyNumber
parameters.description: The policy number for which custom field is added/updated.

post.summary:
Updates the TERMINATED policy number to a new one after validating its uniqueness.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

Obsolete - updates PolicyVehicleUnitUsers data.
This method can be executed by an Admin or Insured Person.

Updates vehicle friendly name for the specified subscription.

Add new link to the PolicyVehicleUnitUsers by using policy/customer number

Get vehicle users for specific subscription.
This method can be executed by an Admin or Insured Person.
Finds policy number and unit serial number by a unique policy registration token.

Get pre-trip status and details.
This method can be executed by an Admin or Insured Person.

Retrieves pre-trip details created during the specified time period for a specific subscription.
This method can be executed by an Admin or Insured Person.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the subscription for which pre-trip details are to be retrieved

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: The start of the time period (optional)

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: The end of the time period (optional).

get.summary:
Retrieves event batch details of the specific pre-trip.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

post.summary:
Resends specific pre-trip to MProfiler for processing.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.

This method is used only if the driver conflict detection feature is implemented in the mobile app,  
and beacons are used for trip recording.  
If multiple users are registered in the mobile app and use the same vehicle or beacon,  
it is possible for both to record the same trip.  
One of the users trips should be marked as "conflicted" to resolve the duplicate recording.
This method can only be executed by an Insured Person.

Send pre-trip (batch with multiple drivin events) to MProfiler for processing.
This method can only be executed by an Insured Person.
Returns specific report (defined by code) filtered with specific parameters

post.summary:
Resets the specified tenant setting to its default value.
This method can only be executed by an Admin with the "TenantSettings" permission.

get.summary:
Get tenant setting by its name or id.
This method can only be executed by an Admin.
If the administrator has the "TenantSettings" permission, all tenant settings can be accessed.  
Otherwise, only publicly available settings are returned.

This method can only be executed by an Admin with the "TenantSettings" permission.

put.summary:
Create job to update trip driver in Mzone and DRP
 Example: PUT api/Trips/{tripId}/Driver/{new_driverId}?subscriptionId={pvu}

parameters.description: New driver id (user id). Should have access to subscription

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Current subscription (vehcile should be the same that trip was recorded with)

Create job to update trip driver in Mzone and DRP

post.summary: Creates a new User Place and creates a Place Geometry Update Request for syncing with MZone.

get.summary: Gets a User Place by ID.

delete.summary:
Deletes a User Place, referenced Place, and update Place Geometry Update Requests as appropriate.
If place geometry update has been sent to MZone, all update requests are updated and kept for audit
purposes, otherwise they are deleted.

patch.summary: Updates a User Place. If Place Geometry has changed, creates a new Place Geometry Update Request.

Requests a new unit for the young driver.
The new unit is going to be:

The new unit is going to be a replacement for the currently used mobile device.

parameters.description: Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition.

parameters.description: Selects which properties to include in the response.

parameters.description: Returns only the first n results.

parameters.description: Includes a count of the matching results in the response.
